articles.title: See the fiery Blood Moon rise in a total lunar eclipse in May's must-see skywatching event - Space.com
articles.description: If the weather is clear, skywatchers across most of the Americas, Europe and Africa will have a view of one of nature's most beautiful spectacles: a total eclipse of the moon.
